subject: Looking for...
author: blueeyedwolf1977
full_text:
If anyone out there hears anyone come across mentioning "Sue or Susie" *(me) and their name is "Ruthie", please PM me ASAP....lost a great friend recently, and she always told me she would do her best to try and let me know she was doing better...had an illness for over 25 years and passed away from a really bad stroke a couple months ago...

Thanks to all!!
